description: Details of Condition 21 - Lighting and Security - as required by planning permission 18/AP/3540 (Variation to Condition 1 (approved plans) of 17/AP/4089 which was an amendment to planning permission 14/AP/1302 for: Demolition of existing buildings and erection of part 26 and part 16 storeys to provide 148 apartments (118 Use Class C3 and 30 flexible use C1/C3), with 1,800 sqm (gross) of flexible retail space (classes A1,A2,A4 and A4) at St Thomas Street and London Bridge Street (concourse) levels, service area, three levels of basement including car parking (28 spaces) and associated hard and soft landscaping, amenity spaces and alterations to existing highways adjoining to allow for changes to the communal amenity and play spaces; increasing the core height by 520mm; minor internal reconfiguration works; minor elevational amendments; and relocation of the visitor cycle parking spaces at St Thomas' Street level)
